infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to track your deliveries and show them on the map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to location to track your deliveries and show them on the map.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow BitNBuild to use your location to track deliveries and show them on the map.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow BitNBuild to use your location to track deliveries and show them on the map.
